name: Elephants on Ice
description:
Elephants on Ice

Play as a Elephant skating around on ice (as Elephants do) and wake up as many of your Elephant friends as you can. Take as many to the finish as you can. The more Elephants that finish the more levels you unlock.

Elephants on Ice was made for the GMTK Jam 2020.

Controls

*This game was designed to be played with and plays best with a controller,  however a keyboard works fine.

  • Move - WASD or the arrow keys on keyboard, or D-Pad of left joystick on controller.
  • Jet Spray - SPACE on keyboard or A or B on controller.
  • Pause - P on keyboard or START on conrtoller.
